content: bandana cowl no 4 by cleo malone yarn gauge 130 yards of dk weight yarn 5 stitches & 8 row per inch in stockinette stitch after blocking needles us 7 / 4 5 mm 16 circulars measurements 14 5 around at neck notions 26 around at base 2 different colored stitch markers 7 tall pattern abbreviations & notes 1 using cast on of your choice cast k / knit on 75 sts pm and join to work in kfb / knit front back the round m / marker 2 k 1 p 1 to last st k 1 pm / place marker 3 repeat step 2 three more times sm / slip marker 4 k 38 pm k to end of round st s / stitch es 5 k to 1 st before m kfb sm kfb k to end of round - repeat the instructions in brackets 6 knit 1 round the number of times indicated 7 repeat steps 5 & 6 until cowl measures 9 from cast on edge to point or until desired height ending after completing step 5 8 k 1 p 1 to 1 st before m k 1 sm p 1 k 1 to end of round 9 k 1 p 1 to 1 st before m kfb sm kfb k 1 p 1 to last st k 1 10 k 1 p 1 to m sm k 1 p 1 to last st k 1 11 k 1 p 1 to 2 sts before m k 1 kfb sm kfb p 1 k 1 to end of round 12 k 1 p 1 to 1 st before m k 1 sm p 1 k 1 to end of round 13 bind off all sts in pattern 14 weave in ends 15 block to measurements
